DataElement.preferredName: Medical Device Product Material CE Mark Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether this device bears a CE (Conformite Europeenne) mark. NOTE(S): CE is a mark for device products placed on the market in the European Economic Area (EEA). By placing the CE marking on a product, the manufacturer affirms that the product conforms with the requirements of the applicable European Community directives.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Device Product Material CE Mark Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._A label which indicates that a product conforms with the essential requirements of the applicable European Community directives.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Property.preferredDefinition: A label which indicates that a product conforms with the essential requirements of the applicable European Community directives.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader
Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
